Text: Truly appreciate the valiant uploads!  Any info/availability of Idolized #5?  Thanks!

Man I was looking for this like crazy yesterday, thank you so much! I love Valiant comics.

I actually buy the volumes [TPB] as soon as they come out, I'ts just that I'm too broke to buy them on a monthly basis. So this is really appreciated.
*to buy issues on a monthly basis.

kakuichi1: nope,sorry.
boboto89: Valiant is the best thing that happened to the comic industry in a while and every title they publish is A+ IMHO.
